data.eml:eml: Semenovia gyirongensis (Apiaceae), a new species from Xizang, China

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Xiao, Qun Ying, Tan, Jin Bo, Hu, Hao Yu, Zhou, Song Dong, He, Xing Jin (2017): Semenovia gyirongensis (Apiaceae), a new species from Xizang, China. PhytoKeys 82: 57-72, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/phytokeys.82.13010, URL: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/phytokeys.82.13010
